page.title: 12Metheringham Childrens-Names
page.content: To see if Christian names change from one generation to the next,Mr.Dymond's class carried out a survey.We found out ,by asking all the children in the Primary School,that the most popular Christian names in 1985.The list below shows the order of popularity.We then surveyed the children again and found out that only two of the girls' names were the same as their mothers'(Joanne and Catherine) but that several of the boys had the same name as their fathers.(Christopher,Daniel and David). {"Childrens' Names".(SAMPLE=240) BOYS. {CHRISTOPHER,}Andrew,James,Daniel,Mark, Paul,Steven,David. GIRLS. {RACHEL,}Sarah,Emma,Lisa,Michelle, Joanne,Clare,Julie,Helen,Catherine.
